description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Justice Newburger [between ca. 1910 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from unverified data provided by the Bain News Service on the negatives or caption cards. Photograph shows Joseph Emanuel Newburger (b. 1853) one of the founders of the Jewish Theological Seminary of America at Commencement Day at Columbia University, New York City, June 3, 1914. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2011 and New York Times, June 3 and 4, 1914) . Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.16164 Call Number: LC-B2- 3078-7
